languages.text: {n}Вы достаточно быстро обнаруживаете, что издает щелканье. На спине одного из сервиторов прямо сквозь аугментации прорастает сочащаяся мутной сукровицей опухоль. Обволоченные воспаленной тканью реле заблокированы, о чем они возвещают повторяющимися щелчками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы достаточно быстро обнаруживаете, что издает щелканье. На спине одного из сервиторов прямо сквозь аугментации прорастает сочащаяся мутной сукровицей опухоль. Обволоченные воспаленной тканью реле заблокированы, о чем они возвещают повторяющимися щелчками.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы достаточно быстро обнаруживаете, что издает щелканье. На спине одного из сервиторов прямо сквозь аугментации прорастает сочащаяся мутной сукровицей опухоль. Обволоченные воспаленной тканью реле заблокированы, о чем они возвещают повторяющимися щелчками.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the Servitors, a tumor, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

{n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the Servitors, a tumor, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

{n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

{n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

{n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

{n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

languages.text: {n}没过多久，你就找到了咔嚓声的来源。其中一个机仆的背上长着肿瘤，那颗肿瘤直直地压在植入物上，正向外渗着浑浊的汁液。发炎组织的继电器被堵塞了，因此才会发出没完没了的咔嚓声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}没过多久，你就找到了咔嚓声的来源。其中一个奴工的背上长着肿瘤，那颗肿瘤直直地压在植入物上，正向外渗着浑浊的汁液。发炎组织的继电器被堵塞了，因此才会发出没完没了的咔嚓声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pronto encuentras la fuente del chasquido. En la espalda de uno de los servidores hay un tumor del que rezuma un icor turbio que crece a través de los aumentos. Los relés, cubiertos de tejido inflamado, están atascados, lo que ocasiona el persistente sonido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pronto encuentras la fuente del chasquido. En la espalda de uno de los servidores hay un tumor del que rezuma un icor turbio que crece a través de los aumentos. Los relés, cubiertos de tejido inflamado, están atascados, lo que ocasiona el persistente sonido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}すぐにカチカチという音の出所がわかった。ひとりのサーヴィターの背中では、濁って膿んだ汁が滲み出る腫瘍が、オーグメントを突き抜けるほどに大きくなっている。継電器が炎症を起こした組織で覆われてブロックされているため、カチッという音が鳴り止まないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}すぐにカチカチという音の出所がわかった。ひとりのサーヴィターの背中では、濁って膿んだ汁が滲み出る腫瘍が、オーグメントを突き抜けるほどに大きくなっている。継電器が炎症を起こした組織で覆われてブロックされているため、カチッという音が鳴り止まないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Schon bald findest du die Quelle des Klickens. Auf dem Rücken eines der Servitoren wächst ein Tumor, der ein dunkles Sekret absondert, direkt aus einer der Augmentationen. Die von dem entzündeten Gewebe bedeckten Relais sind blockiert, daher das ständige Klicken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Schon bald findest du die Quelle des Klickens. Auf dem Rücken eines der Servitoren wächst ein Tumor, der ein dunkles Sekret absondert, direkt aus einer der Augmentationen. Die von dem entzündeten Gewebe bedeckten Relais sind blockiert, daher das ständige Klicken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous ne tardez pas à découvrir l'origine du cliquetis. Une tumeur suintant une humeur trouble s'est développée sur le dos de l'un des servitors et traverse les augmentations. Les tissus enflammés par l'excroissance bloquent les relais, ce qui provoque le cliquetis persistant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne tardez pas à découvrir l'origine du cliquetis. Une tumeur suintant une humeur trouble s'est développée sur le dos de l'un des servitors et traverse les augmentations. Les tissus enflammés par l'excroissance bloquent les relais, ce qui provoque le cliquetis persistant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tıkırtının kaynağını çok geçmeden buluyorsun. Hizmetörlerin birinin sırtındaki, içinden bulanık irin sızan bir ur; ogmentler üzerinde düz bir şekilde büyüyor. Devamlı tıklamanın sebebi, iltihaplı doku ile kaplanmış rölelerin tıkanmış olmasıymış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Soon enough, you locate the source of the clicking. On the back of one of the servitors, a tumour, oozing with murky ichor, is growing straight through the augments. The relays, coated in inflamed tissue, are blocked, hence the reason for the persistent clicking.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tıkırtının kaynağını çok geçmeden buluyorsun. Servitörlerin birinin sırtında, içinden bulanık irin sızan bir ur, ogmentler boyunca düz bir şekilde büyüyor. İltihaplı doku ile kaplanmış röleler tıkanmış, devamlı tıklamanın sebebi bu.{/n}
